name: Jet Term Life
features: Accelerated underwriting option for ages 18–50 (up to $500,000 face)
Fully underwritten option for ages 51–65 (up to $5,000,000 face)

name: Jet Whole Life
features: Accelerated underwriting option for ages 18–50 (up to $500,000 face)
Fully underwritten option for ages 51–80 (up to $5,000,000 face)
Permanent coverage with guaranteed cash value

name: Single Premium Whole Life (SPWL)
features: Point-of-sale telephone interview (no APS if net amount ≤ $50,000)
Telephone interview requirement for $50,000–$100,000 net amount at risk
Fully underwritten for net amount at risk over $100,000
